business_discovery.name: Blue Bottle Coffee
business_discovery.biography: Experience the best of what coffee has to offer.

data.caption:
Holiday gatherings are a chance to create beautiful memories with the ones you love. Make hosting easy and delightful this year with our gifts made for gathering. With mug and coffee sets, you can be sure you‚Äôll have everything you need and simply enjoy your home full of loved ones.

Explore our Hosting Essentials and find items made to help you be more present this season.

As fall slowly recedes and the holidays approach, we encourage you to take a moment just for you. 

üé•: charcoli.y

Introducing our newest Exceedingly Rare coffee, Panama Finca Deborah Interstellar Gesha.

This coffee takes the Panamanian Gesha to new, exhilarating heights. Producer Jamison Savage‚Äôs proprietary Interstellar processing adds bright flavors of ripe peach and fresh citrus with hints of strawberry jam. This coffee is so stunning we featured it at our exclusive Blue Bottle Studio.

Order your tin, before our limited supplies run out.
Our seasonal culinary offerings pair perfectly with our winter coffees to add a little warmth to your shorter days. Head to a cafe and treat yourself to a delicious duo.
How to make our cozy, seasonal favorite - the Black Cardamom Latte - at home! No barista training required.

Our Holiday Collection has items that speak to all of your senses to create a lasting feeling of warmth. Our limited-edition coffees, aesthetic drinkware, and exclusive candle come together to pair perfectly with the cold days spent inside with loved ones.

We‚Äôve even paired our coffees with special keepsakes in gift sets to make finding your perfect pairing easy.

From our expertly grown and produced single origins to our artfully designed and crafted drinkware, our Holiday Collection holds unique pieces that pair well with that one-of-a-kind someone and make each moment with them a little more special.

This season, find pairings that bring artistry to the moments you cherish in life.

Our Holiday Collection is here. The coffee and keepsakes in this collection were crafted and curated to be paired with your favorite moments, loved ones, and occasions this season. Our gift sets bring together our most cherished items to create a feeling of home, happiness, and gratitude. It‚Äôs more than just coffee; it‚Äôs new memories waiting to be made.

We can finally say happy holidays!

Our Holiday Collection is inspired by the simple pairings that make coffee a cherished part of your life -  crafted and curated to help you find transcendent rituals in the small moments that make the holidays so special.

We‚Äôre overwhelmed with gratitude for the incredible support and enthusiasm you‚Äôve brought to Blue Bottle Studio Los Angeles. Your participation has made our journey here truly special.

We‚Äôre on a mission to spread our vision for coffee far and wide. Where should we host our next Blue Bottle Studio? Let us know your dream location.

Our limited-release capsule collection with NIGO¬Æ has dropped.‚Å†
‚Å†
Years ago, we collaborated with NIGO¬Æ, founder of humanmade, to celebrate the opening of our first cafe in the Shibuya neighborhood of Tokyo. We‚Äôre now bringing back this fan-favorite collab for a limited run. ‚Å†
‚Å†
Shop merch, coffees, and more, while supplies last.‚Å†
The ultimate guide to making matcha lattes at home without sacrificing flavor and quality. With our Craft Matcha, it‚Äôs easier than you think.

The same ceremonial-grade matcha that we serve in our cafes is now available to take home. Our Kyoto team scoured Japan to find a matcha that embodies the quality and taste we demand out of our coffee. They found it at Rishouen teahouse, in Uji, Japan. Rishouen is born from five generations of tea knowledge and led by Koji Kagata, a second-generation tea master.‚Å†
‚Å†
Our Craft Matcha comes from shade-grown, first-harvest leaves. The resulting tea is vibrant and savory with an intricate earthy taste. Savor it at home on ice or with a rich pour of steamed milk. Order yours now.‚Å†

Introducing Craft Matcha
First-Harvest.
Ceremonial-Grade.
From Uji, Japan.
Something green is coming.
Turning over a new leaf. 10.24.2023

Grab your coffee and get ready to discover your next must-read. Find your literary adventure with some of our staff-favorite book picks.

Brave New World - Rose, Senior Marketing Manager
Oh God, the Sun Goes - Hayley, Procurement Coordinator
First Person Singular - Jeff, Chief Global Brand Officer
Pride and Prejudice - Liza, Social Media Manager
The Creative Act: A Way of Being - Phoenix, Shipping and Receiving Coordinator 

Special thanks to dieselbookstore

This year we‚Äôre celebrating National Farmer‚Äôs Day with a nod to the innovation farmers are embracing to secure the future of coffee. ‚Å†
‚Å†
R√©gulo Ure√±a and Isabel Rojas of Caf√© Rivense are leaders in coffee innovation and sustainability. Since 2013, they‚Äôve grown variations of hybrid cultivars in search of more complex, novel, and climate-adaptive flavor profiles. Introducing two of Caf√© Rivense‚Äôs first-generation (F1) hybrids, born from a union between the Caturra and Ethiopian heirloom cultivars. ‚Å†
‚Å†
Costa Rica Rivense Casiopea Natural has notes of plum, caramel, and raspberry, while the more delicate Costa Rica Rivense H3 Natural showcases flavors of dried strawberry, nectarine, and lemongrass. ‚Å†
‚Å†
Try both with our Caf√© Rivense del Chirrip√≥ Set, and raise your mug to the farmers who make these innovative coffees possible.‚Å†

Blue Bottle Studio Kyoto has reopened for the autumn season, now through December 11.

Don‚Äôt miss the new menu of featured drinks using unique brewing methods to capture untapped nuances of the coffee plant, from the leaves to the flowers to the pulp. The experience also includes two seasonal dessert pairings. Link in bio for more details and to reserve your seat. We look forward to welcoming you.

Blue Bottle Studio - Kyoto
Address: 2nd floor, Blue Bottle Coffee Kyoto Cafe, 64 Soukawa-cho, Nanzenji, Sakyo-ku, Kyoto, Kyoto Prefecture‚Å†
‚Å†
Operating Days: Friday - Monday
‚Å†Reservation Slots: 10:00-11:30 / 13:00-14:30 / 15:30-17:00‚Å†
Each course lasts approximately 90 minutes.‚Å†
Reservations for up to 4 people.
With our Craft Instant Espresso, you can recreate your favorite Blue Bottle Cafe drinks in the comfort of your kitchen. Learn how to make a Shakerato ‚Äî no barista training required.

Introducing Blend No. 1, our first collaboration with NespressoUSA and a coffee capsule for Vertuo that‚Äôs been years in the making.

Curiosity is what brought Benjamin Brewer, our head of coffee innovation, and Alexis Rodriguez, Nespresso‚Äôs head of coffee development, together. Despite their different approaches to brewing, they share a focus on flavor, purity, and quality. This shared philosophy was the guiding principle that led to an unparalleled new taste in coffee.

 ‚ÄúWe questioned whether we could achieve the same quality result Blue Bottle is known for with this brewing method,‚Äù said Brewer. ‚ÄúThe answer is yes, and it has reminded us that exploring curiosity should always be pursued.‚Äù

Available for tasting at NespressoUSA boutiques. Head to the link in bio to find a boutique near you.
A capsule collection you don‚Äôt want to miss. Stay tuned.

We are proud to announce our first U.S. Blue Bottle Studio installation in Los Angeles. The creative venue is made to indulge the senses and showcase the best of coffee and culinary.

During the 60-minute experience, enjoy a multifaceted coffee tasting menu featuring Exceedingly Rare coffees from around the world and dessert pairings selected to complement the flavors. Every detail down to the serveware and seating has been designed to immerse the senses.

Reserve your spot now via the link in bio.

Blue Bottle Studio
West Hollywood, Los Angeles
Now through November 5

Say hello to our newest single origin, Bolivia Samaipata‚Å† El Fuerte SL-28 Natural. ‚Å†
‚Å†
The Rodriguez family‚Äôs Agricafe creates Bolivian coffees that defy expectations. For this natural processed coffee, they used the rare SL-28 cultivar and a slow, controlled drying technique.‚Å†
‚Å†
This coffee has a bright and intense flavor that's unrestrainedly fruit-forward. With notes of blackberry, chamomile, and honey you'll want to taste this experimental coffee for yourself.‚Å†
‚Å†
‚Å†

Experience Blue Bottle Coffee in a brand-new way with our first ever kiosk popup at the Hong Kong International Airport. Enjoy beverages to-go and an exclusive menu of snacks and pastries for a moment of delicious tranquility and Blue Bottle quality before your flight.

Be sure to look for us in the departure hall adjacent to the Sky Garden. With more convenient popup locations in the works, we look forward to meeting you wherever your travels take you.
